column1: Between now and the end of the year we have very important things to do for the nation in the U.S. Senate – including a #coronavirus relief bill. @SenateGOP is ready to get that work done while Democrats have blocked our path at every turn. https://t.co/K7sK9THxw6

Breakthroughs have been coming one after another in the fight against #coronavirus. These breakthroughs are the light at the end of the tunnel. 90% effectiveness of one vaccine 94% effectiveness of the other. We are going to help save the lives of millions of people worldwide. https://t.co/dYrvxTp70V

As Republicans we’re going to keep talking about the things that we believe people at home believe is important to them which is getting back to work getting our kids safely back to school & getting this coronavirus disease behind us. https://t.co/sWIdOfMqVR

Republican policies have brought back millions of jobs since March. We’re fighting every day for Americans to get back to work for kids to get back to school safely & for our doctors & scientists to put #coronavirus behind us. #JobsReport https://t.co/USsZskbrk3
.@SenateGOP have 3 priorities: getting people back to work getting kids back to school safely & putting the disease behind us. That’s our focus as we fight the #coronavirus.

.@SenateGOP is committed to beating #coronavirus & racing towards a vaccine. This documentary shows how Republican senators are working to beat #coronavirus. We want to inform folks at home & encourage them. America will get through this together. https://t.co/iLzPMTh354

.@SenSchumer & @SpeakerPelosi have once again blocked #COVID19 relief. They think it gives them a better chance of winning the election. This is a calculated political decision by Democrats. Americans deserve better from those who claim to represent them. https://t.co/sH4XDjm9jy

Democrats are blocking another vote on relief for #coronavirus. @SpeakerPelosi & @SenSchumer need to set aside their political demands wasteful spending & opposition to more money for a lifesaving vaccine. Now is the time to make an agreement that would benefit Americans. https://t.co/U9TKYs0OmY

We need to pass the #coronavirus bill that @SenateGOP will have on the floor today. This bill will help in targeted ways such as providing another round of #PPP loans to small businesses. @SpeakerPelosi should call the House back to D.C. to pass this bipartisan bill. https://t.co/tWuStIaq1j

People need help recovering from #COVID but @SpeakerPelosi is moving the goalposts on aid. @SenateGOP will put a targeted & commonsense bill on the floor next week. We will see if Democrats support it or if @SpeakerPelosi keeps her hand on the kill switch so nothing gets done. https://t.co/T1meMXr6AM

Newcastle veterans had their first monthly breakfast since the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic. It was a pleasure to join them at the Weston County Senior Center and thank them personally for their continued service to America’s veterans and their community. https://t.co/6E8i8Tsygd

People still need help recovering from #coronavirus. @realDonaldTrump is right in wanting to give help in a targeted way. @SenateGOP can work with Democrats on the cost of the bill but we ought to limit the contents so it is not a liberal wish list. https://t.co/wLZ2WYAZIV

Congress really should be working towards bipartisan solutions on #coronavirus but Democrats keep obstructing. They’re going to continue to obstruct all the way until Election Day putting politics first & American families last. https://t.co/mSA2sQCOpg

.@SpeakerPelosi rejected a bipartisan effort on #coronavirus by the Problem Solvers Caucus yesterday. Targeted relief is needed right now but I’m not willing to put money toward @SpeakerPelosi’s liberal wish list that has nothing to do with #coronavirus relief. https://t.co/BPSBv4XdfX

Democrats have hung the American people out to dry. @SenateGOP proposed targeted #coronavirus relief for those hardest hit. Democrats clearly have different goals in mind: playing games for political gain. Republicans will continue to fight for Americans. https://t.co/U31mzZYrhx

Democrats have a chance to join Republicans today & vote to give Americans the targeted #coronavirus relief bill they want. Instead Democrats continue to play politics with this critical bill that will help put the disease in the rear view mirror. https://t.co/9swo5ahJRi

I care a lot about the suffering of people around the country. Republicans want to vote on helping get people back to work helping kids get back to school & putting #coronavirus behind us. Democrats are once again playing politics & saying no to the needs of the American people. https://t.co/jVFX5TortH

The @SenateGOP is offering a targeted relief bill for those hardest hit by #coronavirus. We focus #PPP on small businesses most in need & are fighting to put #coronavirus behind us. Democrats should work with us— Americans deserve & need our help. https://t.co/blKtLk1uIf

The great American comeback is happening right now. Senate Republicans want to get a #coronavirus bill on the floor next week that gets people back to work kids back to school & puts the disease in the rear view mirror. Americans want to move forward. https://t.co/tqo39dLaKC

The RNC has been patriotic & inspirational a huge contrast from what we saw a week ago at the DNC. We are hearing stories of opportunity & hope. @realDonaldTrump is the person to lead this great American comeback as we get #coronavirus behind us. https://t.co/e0GanZTJ6V

.@realDonaldTrump is listening to science and is working to get a #coronavirus vaccine ready in record time. We need to be focusing on those suffering right now. @SpeakerPelosi is playing politics with her #coronavirus bill meanwhile people need real help. https://t.co/Plfu1ORgbU

In Wyoming & across the country tribal communities have been hit disproportionately hard by #coronavirus. Tribal governments deserve greater flexibility to spend relief funds to meet the individual needs of each tribe.
.@JerryMoran 10 other senators & I wrote @Senatemajldr & @GOPLeader urging for more #COVID19 resources for tribal governments in the next #coronavirus package. https://t.co/5tziAagI0Y

In WY hunting & fishing are a huge part of our way of life. I’m pleased we will now have expanded recreation access at a time where socially distant outdoor activities like hunting & fishing are more important than ever. https://t.co/qFBURl2wBv

Wrote in @FoxNews about the coming #coronavirus vaccine and how it’s the key to beating this virus once and for all. It will allow us to fully reopen the economy and to return to normal life. Take the vaccine — I certainly will. https://t.co/CbsjFApFq2

Democrats don’t want a deal. That’s why they continue to throw up roadblocks that keep us from moving forward with a #coronavirus relief bill that the American people want. We need to focus on tackling this disease getting people back to work and our kids back to school safely. https://t.co/u3tVUTtR2s

.@SpeakerPelosi’s #coronavirus bill won’t pass & is wasting time. Republicans will hold the line on reckless spending & ensure our next relief bill only includes things directly related to the virus. For the nation’s good wild willful wasteful spending by Democrats must stop. https://t.co/Vcdahtvfzy

Rural communities in Wyoming will benefit from @realDonaldTrump’s executive action to improve access to telemedicine. During the #COVID19 pandemic #telehealth is more important than ever in making sure patients get the care they need. https://t.co/mnxqlKAk9E
The Senate GOP introduced a framework for the next #coronavirus relief legislation. It focuses on getting people back to work kids back to school & defeating #coronavirus. https://t.co/46pbzpakRl
Great to be back in #Wyoming and to sit down with #KTWO’s @TaylorWirtz  and @RyanMatoushWX to talk about the latest #coronavirus legislation. #K2TV https://t.co/Dd4KZHecwz

Rising Covid-19 cases are troubling but that doesn’t mean we have to stop reopening responsibly. Americans have made great sacrifices & want to go back to work. We don’t want another shutdown & don’t want laws from Congress that make it easier to stay closed & harder to reopen. https://t.co/bdF5JPF1w0

We’re looking at $1 tril. dollars in new #coronavirus legislation but we’re going to spend this responsibly unlike @SpeakerPelosi’s & @SenSchumer’s plans. We need to focus on the disease & helping the economy recover. https://t.co/BgH96S99yv
Went on @FoxNews to talk about possible next steps in #coronavirus relief legislation with @DavidAsmanfox. https://t.co/DFOwR6jjAE

The next #coronavirus bill needs to be a recovery bill a bridge to a healthier economy. It should be one that @SpeakerPelosi can pass in the House @senatemajldr can pass in the Senate & @realDonaldTrump will sign. https://t.co/dyFNX4ekTv

Wrote in @RealClearNews about how a second shutdown from #coronavirus would put the economy back on life support. We can be smart & sensible as we reopen the country. That is the approach we need. https://t.co/IRP7lYSylz

We need another #coronavirus bill & it needs to help get people back to work get kids back to school save lives & provide liability protection. But the Democrats’ plan is just @SpeakerPelosi’s handout heaven. We can’t continue to pay people more to sit at home. https://t.co/fhMflPHbnc

.@realDonaldTrump is right. We need to get politics out of #coronavirus recovery & get children back in school. We need to do this responsibly & smartly. We cannot afford another lost year of education for our students. https://t.co/SWrAu3yocG

Yesterday I spoke with leaders of the Northern Arapaho tribe in WY. There was a delay in getting all #coronavirus relief funds to tribes but they’ve received their funds now. #Coronavirus has disproportionately impacted the tribes so it’s important to see what more we can do. https://t.co/ZqMoteBkPD
Went on @FoxNews @AmericaNewsroom this morning to discuss new #coronavirus cases and what we can do to help stop the spread and continue to safely reopen the country. https://t.co/PBlvzf1R8a

Went on @SquawkCNBC to talk about #coronavirus & our nation’s economic recovery. Any new legislation to deal with the crisis needs to protect against unfair lawsuits & promote infrastructure which creates jobs. https://t.co/ra09KcyyEr

A slight rise in #coronavirus cases was expected as people went back to work & back into their communities but we are ready for this. We have plenty of testing hospital capacity if needed & breakthrough activities with vaccine development. We are not shutting down again. https://t.co/E9gb36bUQ1

In a public-private partnership we are calling Operation Warp Speed researchers scientists & doctors are making record progress on a #coronavirus vaccine for Americans & the world. The goal as we recover from this crisis is to keep Americans safe & get them back to work. https://t.co/X2V96imbqJ

Taking away people’s educational opportunities social supports & livelihoods has a negative impact. We can protect people from #coronavirus & get back to normal life. For the good of society it's important we reopen now. It's time for America to get back in the saddle again. https://t.co/r906dIFHVr

Blue states continue to ask for bailouts from the federal government. This is due to mismanagement of money over decades. Any other #coronavirus bill should give states more flexibility in spending with the money they have already been given but not provide unfair bailouts. https://t.co/Acg0t3A26e

Wrote in @FoxNewsOpinion that we can’t let the cure for #coronavirus be worse than the disease. We closed America to bend the curve & make sure we had adequate medical resources. We accomplished this in many places. We need to open smartly safely & soon. https://t.co/NN7HxXJy1R

#MemorialDay looks a little bit different this year in light of the #COVID19 pandemic. It didn’t stop folks from coming out across Wyoming to responsibly honor & remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice. Thanks to Worland for allowing me to be a part of your ceremony today. https://t.co/cYz7kxcSI9

.@SenateGOP had a great meeting with @realDonaldTrump yesterday to discuss getting people back to work & getting #coronavirus behind us. The Democrats’ current plans will not actually help America & Americans recover from this crisis. https://t.co/ZqFqfzEz97

.@SpeakerPelosi’s $3 trillion #coronavirus bill is a giveaway to Democrats’ favored groups. This isn’t a solution for the crisis facing America. What we see here is a partisan political playbook. It's the Democrats’ agenda for the 2020 election. https://t.co/FMO0uPDuDq

Americans need a life preserver but @SpeakerPelosi has thrown them an anvil. Her #coronavirus proposal is pricey partisan & doesn’t help those impacted by Covid-19. This bill is a socialist Democrat dream & a nightmare for Americans. https://t.co/IdyNHSQtuZ

The #coronavirus has made clear that America’s relationship with China is built on a house of cards. It is too risky & it is time to cut off this dangerous dependence. By mishandling and manipulating the crisis China has revealed itself to be not worthy of our trust. https://t.co/MY30G7zFuU

We need to reopen our communities & reopen the economy through targeted temporary relief that focuses on the impact of #coronavirus. @SpeakerPelosi’s bloated & partisan $3 trillion dollar plan is a payout to her liberal constituencies not a solution to our current crisis. https://t.co/MEV1i1KITm

.@DonellsCandies is a staple in Casper. It’s wonderful to hear the #PaycheckProtectionProgram will help this WY small business make it through the #coronavirus crisis. Congress will continue to work to help families & small businesses through this time. https://t.co/8J1CDkKlc6

On #NationalNursesDay we thank our nurses who put their health & safety at risk to keep our communities healthy. During #COVID19 pandemic your service is more important than ever. We’re extremely grateful for your dedication compassion & sacrifice during this challenging time. https://t.co/gTMiJMhjHl

This critical funding will give tribal leaders the resources they desperately need to help slow the spread of #COVID19 on the reservation and protect the most vulnerable members of their tribes. https://t.co/JCAolY2zjE

The Wind River Reservation has been hit especially hard by #COVID19 but more help is on the way. Thanks to funding included in the #CARESAct the Eastern Shoshone & Northern Arapaho tribes will immediately receive more than $29 million combined in Coronavirus relief funding.

There are 30 mil. Americans out of work through no fault of their own & that’s why it is important that the Senate is in session. We can use targeted temporary & specifically focused legislation to help those impacted by #coronavirus. https://t.co/81dzA30FUC

Thanks @Jillian4Supt and @WYOEducation for inviting me to interact with so many incredible students from across the state. Happy we could all continue to learn from each other during this unique and challenging time. #togetherapartwy #COVID19 https://t.co/kbZTR1pVQd

Wrote in @WashTimesOpEd about the financial crisis rural hospitals face. Rural hospitals & the communities they serve must not become collateral damage in the #coronavirus war. https://t.co/vP7x9vsdDM

Teaming up with @SenTinaSmith to provide relief amid #coronavirus pandemic to rural hospitals in Wyoming & across the country. Our bipartisan bill will make small rural county and locally-owned hospitals eligible for the #PaycheckProtectionProgram https://t.co/3eNrK8B2tE

It’s time to reopen America and do it in a smart way. Everyone in this country has been impacted by #coronavirus and the way to help Americans through this crisis is additional funding to the #PaycheckProtectionProgram. https://t.co/Yd819uwcVN

I want to make sure we stop the spread of #coronavirus but also speed up relief to American workers & that means paychecks. @SpeakerPelosi is blocking us from adding new funding to the #PaycheckProtectionProgram. People need their paychecks. https://t.co/0IhyO4GCR9

Had a great conversation with @jhradionews earlier this week about the progress being made in the fight against #coronavirus. America will get beyond the #coronavirus crisis because we are a strong & resilient nation. https://t.co/KCBwDVB5di

.@SpeakerPelosi is once again playing politics with much-needed #coronavirus legislation by holding up help for small businesses. We need to pass more targeted temporary aid to help get people back to work & our nation through the #coronavirus crisis. https://t.co/dajIcJ1fZx

It’s critical that any fourth emergency package meet the needs of the American people. Once we are past the #coronavirus threat we can consider another bipartisan package to further help the economy. https://t.co/UmAdfWWJ9j

On my website you can now access a #COVID19 resource guide with links and critical information for people in Wyoming regarding public health help for small businesses unemployment benefits and other programs available to help during this pandemic. https://t.co/aj5G1sDfkz https://t.co/J4afvYMK7M

America’s small businesses are the backbone of our nation but they face a life-or-death situation in the midst of the #coronavirus. Starting today small businesses can take part in the #PaycheckProtectionProgram that the #CARESAct established. https://t.co/FjDUkXHAWg

Wrote in @CSTribune today about why it’s critical that HHS @SecAzar uses funding in #CARESAct to provide immediate financial relief for our rural hospitals in WY and across the country. We cannot stand by and watch rural hospitals become collateral damage in the #coronavirus war. https://t.co/z62V6Pnw7r

A majority of rural hospitals have ceased performing elective procedures & seeing non-urgent patients. We know the COVID-19 crisis confronting the U.S. must take priority but some rural hospitals across the country only have days left of cash on hand & need immediate assistance.

Help is on the way. President @realDonaldTrump just signed the #CARESAct into law. It will provide immediate relief for American families workers small businesses and support health care workers and #Coronavirus patients. https://t.co/1BUn1CA5ok

It provides needed funding for health care workers and hospitals caring for #coronavirus patients. It brings direct financial relief to families and small businesses. I urge the House to get this to the president’s desk with all possible speed. https://t.co/SJxPsN8ey3

#Coronavirus relief legislation will help our nation overcome this health care & economic crisis. Our country's health care infrastructure & our economic resolve is being tested. We will defeat the coronavirus & we will be back stronger than ever. https://t.co/nJqxc1rnTf https://t.co/2vJydfkU5Y

Americans are doing their part in preventing community spread of #coronavirus but health care workers & the economy need the resources that are in our bipartisan bill. There is no reason to delay. We must pass this bill now. https://t.co/Wszpvqyutp

You are either helping right now or hurting. Pelosi’s handpicked partisan ploys are helping no one. She’s hurting American families by prioritizing airplane emissions same-day voter registration&wind energy tax credits over #coronavirus relief. #StopTheGamesNancy #PassTheBill

We need to make sure when Americans wake up tomorrow they don't have the same fear about #coronavirus & their family's wellbeing. We need decisive action today. The time for politics is beyond us. We need to vote today & we need to pass this today. https://t.co/bYdL6g9de7
The package we’ve put together will stabilize our economy & jobs while we all step up to get the coronavirus health crisis past us. The American people need results. The Democrat delay must end now.

Senate Republicans are on a rescue operation to save our country. We are acting to bring immediate relief to families small businesses & those providing care to #coronavirus patients across the country. https://t.co/h4Gh81UP33

It’s no time for politics. We need to pass #coronavirus legislation today. The package we're working on would give immediate relief to families & make sure small businesses can keep their employees. The lives & livelihoods of people are at risk so we must act now. @MorningsMaria https://t.co/9Cz6aSxAJM

Tonight Democrats blocked emergency coronavirus legislation drafted in a bipartisan way to provide immediate relief for American families. Democrats need to put partisan politics aside and join us in passing emergency funding to help Americans and stabilize our economy now.
Great conversation about coronavirus and medical efforts to stop the spread. Thanks to @TedCruz for having me on his podcast #TheVerdict. https://t.co/9DaeRiIovs https://t.co/p0BIA014VK

Congress will stop at nothing to assure that America and Americans survive and revive and thrive. We’re working on legislation that will bolster our economy and help small businesses stay viable. Together we will defeat the #coronavirus. https://t.co/CPK0qS6bV0

Spoke to @foxandfriends this morning on how Congress’ coronavirus legislation is a rescue operation for our country. The American people expect Congress to act & to do it in a bipartisan way. We need all hands on deck to deal with & recover from the #coronavirus. https://t.co/hwr24R1l7T

America is in a health & economic crisis & Congress has a responsibility to provide relief to those impacted. Today we passed the Families First Coronavirus Response Act. https://t.co/QmrU9nMxQx https://t.co/oHQr8lDoFa

The economy is hurt by everything we are doing to protect public health. To get a healthy robust economy back we have to get the #coronavirus threat behind us. The quickest way to do that is by taking the proper steps today to prevent any further spread of the illness. https://t.co/RcEcAzDEg8

People are facing challenges all across the country. I sat down with @ShannonBream tonight to discuss how Congress is working to provide immediate relief for American workers and families as we combat the #coronavirus. https://t.co/2yt2CekSOZ

Congress is trying to pass targeted timely & focused legislation to minimize the impact of the #coronavirus on the people who need help the most. We are especially trying to do this without putting an extra burden on small businesses. https://t.co/bAe1a6V5Kl
Together we can do our part to help stop the spread of #Coronavirus. https://t.co/trRCOrqLbQ
Joined @SandraSmithFox on @FoxNews this morning to respond to @realDonaldTrump’s oval office address regarding #coronavirus and the steps we’re taking to protect Americans. https://t.co/pKCIs6kAfl

#Coronavirus emergency funding provides a surge of more than $8 bil. in resources to combat the virus. That is what experts have told us they need for research efforts vaccine development & treatment. It also includes millions of dollars for response & prevention efforts in WY. https://t.co/vATLPwJqeH
The U.S. is doing everything possible to combat and contain the #coronavirus. @realDonaldTrump and his administration are fully engaged in responding to this virus. https://t.co/2nWTZ7DM3F
#Coronavirus could turn on us quickly so we have to be vigilant. We are doing everything we need to make sure our hospitals are fully prepared. https://t.co/LjCeYsb3E7
The U.S. is prepared to deal with #coronavirus. Initial funding to @CDCgov was a good start but more is needed for testing treatment & vaccine development. https://t.co/LUHhX1V5iJ
